perturbation.original_text: a. Subject to the terms set forth in this agreement, Erchonia grants Distributor the exclusive, non- transferable right and license to promote, distribute and sell the Products identified in Exhibit A to those type of customer specified in Exhibit B and only within the Territory specified in Exhibit B. Distributor shall only distribute or sell the Products to customers who are licensed health care professionals and meet the other requirements set forth in Exhibit B.
perturbation.changed_text: a. Subject to the terms set forth in this agreement, Erchonia grants Distributor the exclusive, non- transferable right and license to promote, distribute and sell the Products identified in Exhibit A to those type of customer specified in Exhibit B and only within the Territory specified in Exhibit B. Distributor may distribute or sell the Products to any customer, regardless of whether they are licensed health care professionals or meet the other requirements set forth in Exhibit B.
perturbation.explanation: The original text explicitly limits the Distributor to selling to licensed health care professionals meeting Exhibit B requirements. The modification removes this restriction, creating a contradiction and uncertainty about who the Distributor can sell to.

perturbation.original_text: b. Distributor agrees that during the term of this agreement it meet the minimum performance goals set forth in Exhibit C to this agreement. Failure to meet these minimum performance goals for any period, shall, at Erchonia's option (i) be considered a breach of this agreement for which Erchonia shall have all the rights and remedies provided for herein upon a breach of this agreement, including termination of this agreement, or (ii) shall give Erchonia to terminate or limit the exclusivity provisions of this agreement
perturbation.changed_text: b. Distributor agrees that during the term of this agreement it must attempt to meet the minimum performance goals set forth in Exhibit C to this agreement. Failure to meet these minimum performance goals for any period, shall not be considered a breach of this agreement, nor shall give Erchonia to terminate or limit the exclusivity provisions of this agreement. Erchonia may offer guidance on how to meet these goals.
perturbation.explanation: The original text makes meeting minimum performance goals a requirement, with failure leading to breach or termination of exclusivity. The modified text turns this into an aspirational goal, removing any consequences for failure and thus contradicting the original severity.

perturbation.original_text: Prices will remain in effect for the period of the initial 5 year term.
perturbation.changed_text: Prices may be changed at any time at Erchonia's sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original text says that prices remain in effect for the initial five-year term. By stating that the prices may be changed at any time directly contradicts the original contract and brings uncertainty.
perturbation.location: SCHEDULE A ERCHONIA CORPORATION Products and Pricing
